help:
Capture the Flag
Capture any of the other teams' flag and retrieve it to your own to receive points. Whichever team has the most points by the end of the round wins it.
Rounds: Press F3 inbetween rounds to select a new team when the next round starts. If you choose not to select a new team, you will be automatically assigned to the next team on the list. Note: in maps that have spawnscreen disabled, pressing F3 would assign you to the team with the least players in it.
Spawnscreen: Use the arrow keys to navigate between teams and press Enter to join one.
